content: 1 Paul､ a called apostle of Jesus Christ, through God’s will,— And Sosthenes the brother,—
content_old: 1 Paul､ a called apostle of Jesus Christ, through God’s will,— And Sosthenes the brother,—

content: 2 Unto the assembly of God which is in Corinth, Sanctified in Christ Jesus､ Called saints,— With all who call upon the name of our Lord Jesus Christ in every place,—their Lord and ours:
content_old: 2 Unto the assembly of God which is in Corinth, Sanctified in Christ Jesus､ Called saints,— With all who call upon the name of our Lord Jesus Christ in every place,—their Lord and ours:

content: 3 Favour unto you､ and peace, From God our Father､ and Lord Jesus Christ.
content_old: 3 Favour unto you､ and peace, From God our Father､ and Lord Jesus Christ.

content: 4 I give thanks unto my God､ at all times､ concerning you, By reason of the favour of God given unto you in Christ Jesus,—
content_old: 4 I give thanks unto my God､ at all times､ concerning you, By reason of the favour of God given unto you in Christ Jesus,—

content: 5 That in everything ye have been enriched in him— In all discourse and in all Knowledge;
content_old: 5 That in everything ye have been enriched in him— In all discourse and in all Knowledge;

content: 6 Even as the witness of the Christ hath been confirmed in you,
content_old: 6 Even as the witness of the Christ hath been confirmed in you,

content: 7 So that ye come short in no gift of favour,— Ardently awaiting the revelation of our Lord Jesus Christ:
content_old: 7 So that ye come short in no gift of favour,— Ardently awaiting the revelation of our Lord Jesus Christ:

content: 8 Who will also confirm you unto the end､ Unaccusable in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ:
content_old: 8 Who will also confirm you unto the end､ Unaccusable in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ:

content: 9 Faithfull is God､ through whom ye have been called into the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.
content_old: 9 Faithfull is God､ through whom ye have been called into the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.

content: 10 But I beseech you､ brethren, Through the name of our Lord Jesus Christ,— That the same thing ye all be saying, And that there be not､ among you､ divisions; But that ye be fitly joined together— In the same mind､ And in the same judgment.
content_old: 10 But I beseech you､ brethren, Through the name of our Lord Jesus Christ,— That the same thing ye all be saying, And that there be not､ among you､ divisions; But that ye be fitly joined together— In the same mind､ And in the same judgment.

content: 11 For it hath been signified unto me､ concerning you､ my brethren,— By them who are of the household of Chloe,— That there are strifes among you.
content_old: 11 For it hath been signified unto me､ concerning you､ my brethren,— By them who are of the household of Chloe,— That there are strifes among you.

content: 12 Now I mean this,— That each one of you is saying— I indeed､ am of Paul, But I of Apollos, But I of Cephas, But I of Christ:
content_old: 12 Now I mean this,— That each one of you is saying— I indeed､ am of Paul, But I of Apollos, But I of Cephas, But I of Christ:

content: 13 The Christ is divided! Was Paul crucified for you? Or into the name of Paul were ye immersed?
content_old: 13 The Christ is divided! Was Paul crucified for you? Or into the name of Paul were ye immersed?

content: 14 I give thanks､ that none of you did I immerse— Save Crispus and Gaius,
content_old: 14 I give thanks､ that none of you did I immerse— Save Crispus and Gaius,

content: 15 Lest any should say— Into my own name I immersed;—
content_old: 15 Lest any should say— Into my own name I immersed;—

content: 16 Yea! I immersed the house of Stephanas also,— Besides I know not whether anyone else I immersed.
content_old: 16 Yea! I immersed the house of Stephanas also,— Besides I know not whether anyone else I immersed.

content: 17 For Christ sent me not､ to be immersing, But to be telling the good news,— Not with wisdom of discourse､ Lest void should be made the cross of the Christ.
content_old: 17 For Christ sent me not､ to be immersing, But to be telling the good news,— Not with wisdom of discourse､ Lest void should be made the cross of the Christ.

content: 18 For the discourse which concerneth the Cross Unto them､ indeed､ who are perishing is foolishness; But unto them who are being saved—unto us it is God’s power.
content_old: 18 For the discourse which concerneth the Cross Unto them､ indeed､ who are perishing is foolishness; But unto them who are being saved—unto us it is God’s power.

content: 19 For it is written— I will destroy the wisdom of the wise, And the discernment of the discerning will I set aside.
content_old: 19 For it is written— I will destroy the wisdom of the wise, And the discernment of the discerning will I set aside.

content: 20 Where is the wise? Where is the scribe? Where is the disputer of this age? Hath not God made foolish the wisdom of the world?
content_old: 20 Where is the wise? Where is the scribe? Where is the disputer of this age? Hath not God made foolish the wisdom of the world?

content: 21 For seeing that in the wisdom of God The world through its wisdom did not get to know God God was well-pleased— Through the foolishness of the thing proclaimed to save them that believe.
content_old: 21 For seeing that in the wisdom of God The world through its wisdom did not get to know God God was well-pleased— Through the foolishness of the thing proclaimed to save them that believe.

content: 22 Seeing that Both Jews for signs do ask､ And Greeks for wisdom do seek,
content_old: 22 Seeing that Both Jews for signs do ask､ And Greeks for wisdom do seek,

content: 23 Whereas we proclaim a Christ who hath been crucified,— Unto Jews indeed､ an occasion of stumbling, And unto Gentiles foolishness;
content_old: 23 Whereas we proclaim a Christ who hath been crucified,— Unto Jews indeed､ an occasion of stumbling, And unto Gentiles foolishness;

content: 24 But unto the called themselves— Both Jews and Greeks Christ God’s power､ and God’s wisdom.
content_old: 24 But unto the called themselves— Both Jews and Greeks Christ God’s power､ and God’s wisdom.

content: 25 Because God’s foolish thing is wiser than men, And God’s weak thing mightier than men.
content_old: 25 Because God’s foolish thing is wiser than men, And God’s weak thing mightier than men.

content: 26 For be looking at the calling of you､ brethren,— That there were Not many wise､ according to flesh. Not many powerful, Not many high-born:
content_old: 26 For be looking at the calling of you､ brethren,— That there were Not many wise､ according to flesh. Not many powerful, Not many high-born:

content: 27 On the contrary— The foolish things of the world hath God chosen､ That he might put to shame them who are wise, And the weak things of the world hath God chosen､ That he might put to shame the things that are mighty,
content_old: 27 On the contrary— The foolish things of the world hath God chosen､ That he might put to shame them who are wise, And the weak things of the world hath God chosen､ That he might put to shame the things that are mighty,

content: 28 And the low-born things of the world､ And the things that are despised hath God chosen,— And the things that are not,— That the things that are he might bring to nought;
content_old: 28 And the low-born things of the world､ And the things that are despised hath God chosen,— And the things that are not,— That the things that are he might bring to nought;

content: 29 So that no flesh should boast before God.
content_old: 29 So that no flesh should boast before God.

content: 30 But of him are ye in Christ Jesus,— Who hath been made wisdom unto us､ from God,— Both righteousness､ and sanctification､ and redemption:
content_old: 30 But of him are ye in Christ Jesus,— Who hath been made wisdom unto us､ from God,— Both righteousness､ and sanctification､ and redemption:

content: 1 I therefore､ brethren, when I came unto you, Came not with excellency of discourse or wisdom Declaring unto you the mystery of God;
content_old: 1 I therefore､ brethren, when I came unto you, Came not with excellency of discourse or wisdom Declaring unto you the mystery of God;

content: 2 For I had not determined to know anything among you､ Save Jesus Christ,—and him as one who had been crucified!
content_old: 2 For I had not determined to know anything among you､ Save Jesus Christ,—and him as one who had been crucified!

content: 3 I therefore､ in weakness､ and in fear､ and in much trembling Came to be with you,
content_old: 3 I therefore､ in weakness､ and in fear､ and in much trembling Came to be with you,

content: 4 And my discourse､ and what I proclaimed Were not in suasive words of wisdom, But in demonstration of Spirit and power:
content_old: 4 And my discourse､ and what I proclaimed Were not in suasive words of wisdom, But in demonstration of Spirit and power:

content: 5 In order that your faith might not be In men’s wisdom､ But in God’s power.
content_old: 5 In order that your faith might not be In men’s wisdom､ But in God’s power.

content: 6 Wisdom however､ we do speak among the full-grown,— Wisdom indeed､ Not of this age, Nor of the rulers of this age､ who are to come to nought;
content_old: 6 Wisdom however､ we do speak among the full-grown,— Wisdom indeed､ Not of this age, Nor of the rulers of this age､ who are to come to nought;

content: 7 But we speak God’s wisdom､ in a sacred secret, That hidden wisdom､ Which God marked out beforehand､ before the ages､ for our glory,—
content_old: 7 But we speak God’s wisdom､ in a sacred secret, That hidden wisdom､ Which God marked out beforehand､ before the ages､ for our glory,—

content: 8 Which none of the rulers of this age had come to know, For had they known, not､ in that case､ the Lord of the glory would they have crucified!
content_old: 8 Which none of the rulers of this age had come to know, For had they known, not､ in that case､ the Lord of the glory would they have crucified!

content: 9 But even as it is written— The things which eye hath not seen､ and ear hath not heard, And upon the heart of man have not come up,— Whatsoever things God hath prepared for them that love him
content_old: 9 But even as it is written— The things which eye hath not seen､ and ear hath not heard, And upon the heart of man have not come up,— Whatsoever things God hath prepared for them that love him

content: 10 Unto us in fact､ hath God revealed through the Spirit; For the Spirit into all things maketh search､ Yea! the deep things of God.
content_old: 10 Unto us in fact､ hath God revealed through the Spirit; For the Spirit into all things maketh search､ Yea! the deep things of God.

content: 11 For who of men knoweth the things of a man,— Save the spirit of the man that is in him? Thus even the things of God hath no one come to know､ Save the Spirit of God.
content_old: 11 For who of men knoweth the things of a man,— Save the spirit of the man that is in him? Thus even the things of God hath no one come to know､ Save the Spirit of God.

content: 12 But as for us— Not the spirit of the world have we received, But the Spirit which is of God,— That we might know the things which by God have been given in favour unto us:—
content_old: 12 But as for us— Not the spirit of the world have we received, But the Spirit which is of God,— That we might know the things which by God have been given in favour unto us:—

content: 13 Which we also speak— Not in words taught of human wisdom, But in such as are taught of the Spirit､ By spiritual words spiritual things explaining.
content_old: 13 Which we also speak— Not in words taught of human wisdom, But in such as are taught of the Spirit､ By spiritual words spiritual things explaining.

content: 14 But a man of the soul doth not welcome the things of the Spirit of God, For they are foolishness unto him､ and he cannot get to know them､ Because spiritually are they examined;
content_old: 14 But a man of the soul doth not welcome the things of the Spirit of God, For they are foolishness unto him､ and he cannot get to know them､ Because spiritually are they examined;

content: 15 But the man of the spirit､ On the one hand､ examineth all things, But､ on the other､ he himself by no one is examined.
content_old: 15 But the man of the spirit､ On the one hand､ examineth all things, But､ on the other､ he himself by no one is examined.

content: 1 I therefore､ brethren, have not been able to speak unto you､ As unto men of the Spirit, But as unto men of the flesh— As unto babes in Christ:—
content_old: 1 I therefore､ brethren, have not been able to speak unto you､ As unto men of the Spirit, But as unto men of the flesh— As unto babes in Christ:—

content: 2 With milk have I fed you､ Not with meat; For not yet have ye been able;— Nay! not yet even now are ye able,
content_old: 2 With milk have I fed you､ Not with meat; For not yet have ye been able;— Nay! not yet even now are ye able,

content: 3 For ye are yet fleshly. For whereas there are､ among you､ jealousy and strife Are ye not fleshly､ and after the manner of men walking?
content_old: 3 For ye are yet fleshly. For whereas there are､ among you､ jealousy and strife Are ye not fleshly､ and after the manner of men walking?

content: 4 For as soon as one beginneth to say— I indeed､ am of Paul! And another— I of Apollos! Are ye not men?
content_old: 4 For as soon as one beginneth to say— I indeed､ am of Paul! And another— I of Apollos! Are ye not men?

content: 5 What then is Apollos? and､ What is Paul? Ministers through whom ye believed, and each as the Lord gave to him.
content_old: 5 What then is Apollos? and､ What is Paul? Ministers through whom ye believed, and each as the Lord gave to him.

content: 6 I planted, Apollos watered,— But God caused to grow.
content_old: 6 I planted, Apollos watered,— But God caused to grow.

content: 7 So that､ neither is he that planteth anything, Nor､ he that watereth,— But God who causeth to grow.
content_old: 7 So that､ neither is he that planteth anything, Nor､ he that watereth,— But God who causeth to grow.

content: 8 Moreover he that planteth and he that watereth are one:— Howbeit､ each one his own reward shall receive,—according to his own labour.
content_old: 8 Moreover he that planteth and he that watereth are one:— Howbeit､ each one his own reward shall receive,—according to his own labour.

content: 9 For we are God’s fellow-workmen: Ye are God’s farm､ God’s building.
content_old: 9 For we are God’s fellow-workmen: Ye are God’s farm､ God’s building.

content: 10 According to the favour of God which hath been given unto me As a wise master-builder I laid a foundation, Whereas another is building thereon; But let each one see､ how he buildeth thereon;
content_old: 10 According to the favour of God which hath been given unto me As a wise master-builder I laid a foundation, Whereas another is building thereon; But let each one see､ how he buildeth thereon;

content: 11 For other foundation can no one lay､ than that which is lying, Which is Jesus Christ.
content_old: 11 For other foundation can no one lay､ than that which is lying, Which is Jesus Christ.

content: 12 But if anyone is building､ upon the foundation— Gold､ silver､ precious stones, Wood､ hay､ straw
content_old: 12 But if anyone is building､ upon the foundation— Gold､ silver､ precious stones, Wood､ hay､ straw

content: 13 Each one’s work shall be made manifest; For the day will make it plain, Because by fire is it to be revealed,— And each one’s work of what sort it is the fire itself will prove:—
content_old: 13 Each one’s work shall be made manifest; For the day will make it plain, Because by fire is it to be revealed,— And each one’s work of what sort it is the fire itself will prove:—

content: 14 If anyone’s work shall abide､ which he built A reward shall he receive,—
content_old: 14 If anyone’s work shall abide､ which he built A reward shall he receive,—

content: 15 If anyone’s work shall be burnt up He shall suffer loss､ But shall himself be saved— Though thus as through fire.
content_old: 15 If anyone’s work shall be burnt up He shall suffer loss､ But shall himself be saved— Though thus as through fire.

content: 16 Know ye not That ye are a shrine of God, And that the Spirit of God within you doth dwell?
content_old: 16 Know ye not That ye are a shrine of God, And that the Spirit of God within you doth dwell?

content: 17 If anyone doth mar the shrine of God God will mar him; For the shrine of God is holy,— And such are ye.
content_old: 17 If anyone doth mar the shrine of God God will mar him; For the shrine of God is holy,— And such are ye.

content: 18 Let no one be deceiving himself:— If anyone imagineth himself to be wise､ among you､ in this age Let him become foolish､ that he may become wise;
content_old: 18 Let no one be deceiving himself:— If anyone imagineth himself to be wise､ among you､ in this age Let him become foolish､ that he may become wise;

content: 19 For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God; For it is written— He that taketh the wise in their knavery,—
content_old: 19 For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God; For it is written— He that taketh the wise in their knavery,—

content: 20 And again— The Lord taketh note of the speculations of the wise､ that they are vain.
content_old: 20 And again— The Lord taketh note of the speculations of the wise､ that they are vain.

content: 21 So then､ let no one be boasting in men; For all things are yours,—
content_old: 21 So then､ let no one be boasting in men; For all things are yours,—

content: 22 Whether Paul､ or Apollos､ or Cephas, Or the world､ or life､ or death, Or things present､ or things to come All are yours,
content_old: 22 Whether Paul､ or Apollos､ or Cephas, Or the world､ or life､ or death, Or things present､ or things to come All are yours,

content: 1 Let a man so be reckoning of us, As officers of Christ､ And stewards of sacred secrets of God.
content_old: 1 Let a man so be reckoning of us, As officers of Christ､ And stewards of sacred secrets of God.

content: 2 Here furthermore､ it is sought in stewards､ That faithful one be found.
content_old: 2 Here furthermore､ it is sought in stewards､ That faithful one be found.

content: 3 With me however､ it counteth for the very smallest thing, That by you I should be examined､ Or by a human day. Nay! I am not even examining myself,
content_old: 3 With me however､ it counteth for the very smallest thing, That by you I should be examined､ Or by a human day. Nay! I am not even examining myself,

content: 4 For of nothing､ to myself am I conscious; Nevertheless not hereby am I declared righteous, But he that doth examine me is the Lord.
content_old: 4 For of nothing､ to myself am I conscious; Nevertheless not hereby am I declared righteous, But he that doth examine me is the Lord.

content: 5 So then not before the fitting time be judging anything,— Until the Lord shall come, Who will both bring to light the hidden things of darkness､ And make manifest the counsels of the hearts; And then the praise shall come to each one from God.
content_old: 5 So then not before the fitting time be judging anything,— Until the Lord shall come, Who will both bring to light the hidden things of darkness､ And make manifest the counsels of the hearts; And then the praise shall come to each one from God.

content: 6 But these things､ brethren､ have I transferred unto myself and Apollos for your sakes, That in us ye might learn the lesson— Not beyond the things that are written …! That ye do not puff yourselves up individually for this one against that.
content_old: 6 But these things､ brethren､ have I transferred unto myself and Apollos for your sakes, That in us ye might learn the lesson— Not beyond the things that are written …! That ye do not puff yourselves up individually for this one against that.

content: 7 For who maketh thee to differ? and what hast thou which thou didst not receive? But if thou didst even receive it why dost thou boast､ as though thou hadst not received it?
content_old: 7 For who maketh thee to differ? and what hast thou which thou didst not receive? But if thou didst even receive it why dost thou boast､ as though thou hadst not received it?

content: 8 Already ye have become full, Already ye are become rich,— Apart from us ye are become kings! And I would indeed ye had become kings, That we also with you might have together become kings!
content_old: 8 Already ye have become full, Already ye are become rich,— Apart from us ye are become kings! And I would indeed ye had become kings, That we also with you might have together become kings!

content: 9 For I think that God hath set forth us the apostles､ to be last of all, as men devoted to death,— In that a spectacle have we been made､ unto the world,—both unto messengers and unto men.
content_old: 9 For I think that God hath set forth us the apostles､ to be last of all, as men devoted to death,— In that a spectacle have we been made､ unto the world,—both unto messengers and unto men.

content: 10 We are foolish for Christ’s sake, but ye prudent in Christ; We are weak, but ye mighty; Ye all-glorious, but we dishonoured.
content_old: 10 We are foolish for Christ’s sake, but ye prudent in Christ; We are weak, but ye mighty; Ye all-glorious, but we dishonoured.

content: 11 Until the present hour we both hunger and thirst､ and are naked､ and are buffeted､ and are wanderers,
content_old: 11 Until the present hour we both hunger and thirst､ and are naked､ and are buffeted､ and are wanderers,

content: 12 and toil､ working with our own hands: Being reviled we bless, Being persecuted we hold on,
content_old: 12 and toil､ working with our own hands: Being reviled we bless, Being persecuted we hold on,

content: 13 Being defamed we beseech: As the sweepings of the world have we become､ The offscouring of all—until even now.
content_old: 13 Being defamed we beseech: As the sweepings of the world have we become､ The offscouring of all—until even now.

content: 14 Not to shame you write I these things; But as my beloved children I admonish you.
content_old: 14 Not to shame you write I these things; But as my beloved children I admonish you.

content: 15 For though myriads of tutors ye should have in Christ Yet not many fathers; For in Christ Jesus､ through means of the joyful message I begat you.
content_old: 15 For though myriads of tutors ye should have in Christ Yet not many fathers; For in Christ Jesus､ through means of the joyful message I begat you.

content: 16 I beseech you､ therefore,—become imitators of me.
content_old: 16 I beseech you､ therefore,—become imitators of me.

content: 17 For this cause sent I unto you､ Timothy,— Who is my beloved and faithful child in the Lord, Who shall put you in mind of my ways which are in Christ Jesus, Even as everywhere､ in every assembly I teach.
content_old: 17 For this cause sent I unto you､ Timothy,— Who is my beloved and faithful child in the Lord, Who shall put you in mind of my ways which are in Christ Jesus, Even as everywhere､ in every assembly I teach.

content: 18 But as though I were not coming unto you Some are puffed up!
content_old: 18 But as though I were not coming unto you Some are puffed up!

content: 19 Howbeit､ I will come quickly unto you,— If the Lord please,— And will get to know— Not the speech of them who are puffed up But the power;
content_old: 19 Howbeit､ I will come quickly unto you,— If the Lord please,— And will get to know— Not the speech of them who are puffed up But the power;

content: 20 For not in speech is the kingdom of God, But in power.
content_old: 20 For not in speech is the kingdom of God, But in power.

content: 1 On all hands there is reported to be among you—fornication, And such fornication as this— Which not among the nations is found,— As that one should have his father’s wife:—
content_old: 1 On all hands there is reported to be among you—fornication, And such fornication as this— Which not among the nations is found,— As that one should have his father’s wife:—

content: 2 And ye have become puffed up, And have not rather mourned､ In order that he might be removed out of your midst､ who this deed hath wrought.
content_old: 2 And ye have become puffed up, And have not rather mourned､ In order that he might be removed out of your midst､ who this deed hath wrought.

content: 3 For I indeed,— Being absent in the body､ but present in the spirit Have already judged､ As present､ Him who thus this thing hath perpetrated:—
content_old: 3 For I indeed,— Being absent in the body､ but present in the spirit Have already judged､ As present､ Him who thus this thing hath perpetrated:—

content: 4 In the name of our Lord Jesus Ye being gathered together､ And my spirit, With the power of our Lord Jesus
content_old: 4 In the name of our Lord Jesus Ye being gathered together､ And my spirit, With the power of our Lord Jesus

content: 5 To deliver such a one as this､ unto Satan, For the destruction of the flesh,— That the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord.
content_old: 5 To deliver such a one as this､ unto Satan, For the destruction of the flesh,— That the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord.

content: 6 Unseemly is your boast! Know ye not that a little leaven doth leaven the whole of the lump?
content_old: 6 Unseemly is your boast! Know ye not that a little leaven doth leaven the whole of the lump?

content: 7 Purge ye out the old leaven､ That ye may be a new lump,— Even as ye are unleavened; For our passover hath even been sacrificed—Christ:
content_old: 7 Purge ye out the old leaven､ That ye may be a new lump,— Even as ye are unleavened; For our passover hath even been sacrificed—Christ:

content: 8 So then､ let us be keeping the feast, Not with old leaven, Nor with leaven of baseness and wickedness,— But with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth.
content_old: 8 So then､ let us be keeping the feast, Not with old leaven, Nor with leaven of baseness and wickedness,— But with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth.

content: 9 I wrote unto you in my letter— Not to be mixing yourselves up with fornicators;—
content_old: 9 I wrote unto you in my letter— Not to be mixing yourselves up with fornicators;—

content: 10 Not at all meaning the fornicators of this world, or the covetous and extortioners, or idolaters,— Else had ye been obliged､ in that case､ to go out of the world.
content_old: 10 Not at all meaning the fornicators of this world, or the covetous and extortioners, or idolaters,— Else had ye been obliged､ in that case､ to go out of the world.

content: 11 But now I have written unto you not to be mixing yourselves up,— If anyone named a brother Be a fornicator､ or covetous､ or an idolater､ or a reviler､ or a drunkard､ or an extortioner With such a one as this not so much as to be eating together,
content_old: 11 But now I have written unto you not to be mixing yourselves up,— If anyone named a brother Be a fornicator､ or covetous､ or an idolater､ or a reviler､ or a drunkard､ or an extortioner With such a one as this not so much as to be eating together,

content: 12 For what have I to do to be judging them who are without? Do ye not judge them who are within,
content_old: 12 For what have I to do to be judging them who are without? Do ye not judge them who are within,

content: 1 Dare any of you having a matter against his brother Sue for judgment before the unrighteous､ And not before the saints?
content_old: 1 Dare any of you having a matter against his brother Sue for judgment before the unrighteous､ And not before the saints?

content: 2 Or know ye not That the saints shall judge the world? And if by you the world is to be judged Unworthy are ye of the smallest judgment-seats?
content_old: 2 Or know ye not That the saints shall judge the world? And if by you the world is to be judged Unworthy are ye of the smallest judgment-seats?

content: 3 Know ve not That we shall judge messengers? And not､ then､ matters of this life?
content_old: 3 Know ve not That we shall judge messengers? And not､ then､ matters of this life?

content: 4 If､ then for matters of this life ye have judgment-seats Them who are of no account in the assembly these are ye seating thereupon?
content_old: 4 If､ then for matters of this life ye have judgment-seats Them who are of no account in the assembly these are ye seating thereupon?

content: 5 With a view to shame you am I speaking. So is it possible that there is among you—not so much as one wise man､ who shall be able to judge between his brethren,—
content_old: 5 With a view to shame you am I speaking. So is it possible that there is among you—not so much as one wise man､ who shall be able to judge between his brethren,—

content: 6 But brother with brother sueth for judgment, And that before unbelievers?
content_old: 6 But brother with brother sueth for judgment, And that before unbelievers?

content: 7 Already indeed､ it is an utter defeat for you, that ye are having law-suits one with another. Wherefore are ye not rather taking wrong? Wherefore are ye not rather suffering yourselves to be defrauded?
content_old: 7 Already indeed､ it is an utter defeat for you, that ye are having law-suits one with another. Wherefore are ye not rather taking wrong? Wherefore are ye not rather suffering yourselves to be defrauded?

content: 8 Nay! but ye are doing wrong､ and defrauding,—and that your brethren.
content_old: 8 Nay! but ye are doing wrong､ and defrauding,—and that your brethren.

content: 9 Or know ye not That wrong-doers shall not inherit God’s kingdom? Be not deceiving yourselves:— Neither fornicators､ nor idolaters､ nor adulterers､ nor effeminate､ nor sodomites､
content_old: 9 Or know ye not That wrong-doers shall not inherit God’s kingdom? Be not deceiving yourselves:— Neither fornicators､ nor idolaters､ nor adulterers､ nor effeminate､ nor sodomites､

content: 10 nor thieves､ nor covetous､ nor drunkards､ nor revilers､ nor extortioners— Shall inherit God’s kingdom.
content_old: 10 nor thieves､ nor covetous､ nor drunkards､ nor revilers､ nor extortioners— Shall inherit God’s kingdom.

content: 11 And these things were some of you; But ye bathed them away,— But ye were sanctified､ But ye were justified､ In the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, And in the Spirit of our God.
content_old: 11 And these things were some of you; But ye bathed them away,— But ye were sanctified､ But ye were justified､ In the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, And in the Spirit of our God.

content: 12 All things unto me are allowable, But not all things are profitable: All things unto me are allowable, But I will not be brought under authority by any.
content_old: 12 All things unto me are allowable, But not all things are profitable: All things unto me are allowable, But I will not be brought under authority by any.

content: 13 Foods for the belly, and the belly for foods; But God will set aside both it and them. The body however､ is not for fornication, but for the Lord,—and the Lord､ for the body.
content_old: 13 Foods for the belly, and the belly for foods; But God will set aside both it and them. The body however､ is not for fornication, but for the Lord,—and the Lord､ for the body.

content: 14 God moreover､ hath both raised up the Lord, And will raise us up from among the dead through his power.
content_old: 14 God moreover､ hath both raised up the Lord, And will raise us up from among the dead through his power.

content: 15 Know ye not That your bodies are members of Christ? Shall I､ then､ take away the members of the Christ and make them members of a harlot? Far be it!
content_old: 15 Know ye not That your bodies are members of Christ? Shall I､ then､ take away the members of the Christ and make them members of a harlot? Far be it!

content: 16 Or know ye not That he that joineth himself unto the harlot is one body? For､ saith he､ the two shall become one flesh;
content_old: 16 Or know ye not That he that joineth himself unto the harlot is one body? For､ saith he､ the two shall become one flesh;

content: 17 But he that joineth himself unto the Lord is one Spirit.
content_old: 17 But he that joineth himself unto the Lord is one Spirit.

content: 18 Flee fornication! Every sin, whatsoever a man shall commit is outside his body, But he that committeth fornication bringeth sin into his own body.
content_old: 18 Flee fornication! Every sin, whatsoever a man shall commit is outside his body, But he that committeth fornication bringeth sin into his own body.

content: 19 Or know ye not That your body is a shrine of the Holy Spirit that is within you､ which ye have from God? And ye are not your own;—
content_old: 19 Or know ye not That your body is a shrine of the Holy Spirit that is within you､ which ye have from God? And ye are not your own;—

content: 1 Now concerning the things whereof ye wrote It were good for a man､ not to touch a woman;
content_old: 1 Now concerning the things whereof ye wrote It were good for a man､ not to touch a woman;

content: 2 But on account of fornications Let each man have his own wife, And each woman have her own husband:
content_old: 2 But on account of fornications Let each man have his own wife, And each woman have her own husband:

content: 3 Unto the wife let the husband render what is her due, And in like manner the wife also unto the husband,—
content_old: 3 Unto the wife let the husband render what is her due, And in like manner the wife also unto the husband,—

content: 4 The wife over her own body hath not authority､ but the husband, And in like manner the husband also over his own body hath not authority､ but the wife.
content_old: 4 The wife over her own body hath not authority､ but the husband, And in like manner the husband also over his own body hath not authority､ but the wife.

content: 5 Be not depriving one another— Unless perhaps by consent for a season､ That ye may have leisure for prayer, And again may be together,— Lest Satan be tempting you by reason of your want of self-control.
content_old: 5 Be not depriving one another— Unless perhaps by consent for a season､ That ye may have leisure for prayer, And again may be together,— Lest Satan be tempting you by reason of your want of self-control.

content: 6 This however I am saying､ by way of concession, not of injunction;
content_old: 6 This however I am saying､ by way of concession, not of injunction;

content: 7 Besides､ I desire all men to be even as myself,— But each one hath his personal gift from God, One after this manner､ and another after that.
content_old: 7 Besides､ I desire all men to be even as myself,— But each one hath his personal gift from God, One after this manner､ and another after that.

content: 8 But I say to the unmarried､ and to the widows Good were it for them､ that they should abide even as I;
content_old: 8 But I say to the unmarried､ and to the widows Good were it for them､ that they should abide even as I;

content: 9 But if they have not self-control let them marry, For better is it､ to marry than to burn.
content_old: 9 But if they have not self-control let them marry, For better is it､ to marry than to burn.

content: 10 To the married､ however I give charge— Not I but the Lord,— That a wife from her husband do not depart,—
content_old: 10 To the married､ however I give charge— Not I but the Lord,— That a wife from her husband do not depart,—

content: 11 But if she should even depart Let her remain unmarried､ Or to her husband be reconciled; And let not a husband leave his wife.
content_old: 11 But if she should even depart Let her remain unmarried､ Or to her husband be reconciled; And let not a husband leave his wife.

content: 12 But unto the rest say I— Not the Lord,— If any brother hath a wife that believeth not､ And she is well pleased to dwell with him Let him not leave her;
content_old: 12 But unto the rest say I— Not the Lord,— If any brother hath a wife that believeth not､ And she is well pleased to dwell with him Let him not leave her;

content: 13 And a woman who hath a husband that believeth not､ And he is well pleased to dwell with her Let her not leave her husband;—
content_old: 13 And a woman who hath a husband that believeth not､ And he is well pleased to dwell with her Let her not leave her husband;—

content: 14 For the husband that believeth not is hallowed in the wife, And the wife that believeth not is hallowed in the brother: Else were your children impure, But now are they pure.
content_old: 14 For the husband that believeth not is hallowed in the wife, And the wife that believeth not is hallowed in the brother: Else were your children impure, But now are they pure.

content: 15 But if the unbelieving departeth let him depart: The brother or the sister hath not come into bondage､ in such cases, But in peace hath God called us.
content_old: 15 But if the unbelieving departeth let him depart: The brother or the sister hath not come into bondage､ in such cases, But in peace hath God called us.

content: 16 For how knowest thou, O woman, whether thy husband thou shalt save? Or how knowest thou, O man, whether thy wife thou shalt save?
content_old: 16 For how knowest thou, O woman, whether thy husband thou shalt save? Or how knowest thou, O man, whether thy wife thou shalt save?

content: 17 If not— As the Lord hath distributed unto each one, As God hath called each one So let him be walking;— And so in all the assemblies I ordain.
content_old: 17 If not— As the Lord hath distributed unto each one, As God hath called each one So let him be walking;— And so in all the assemblies I ordain.

content: 18 After being circumcised was any called? Let him not become uncircumcised; In uncircumcision hath any been called? Let him not be circumcised:
content_old: 18 After being circumcised was any called? Let him not become uncircumcised; In uncircumcision hath any been called? Let him not be circumcised:

content: 19 The circumcision is nothing､ And the uncircumcision is nothing,— But keeping the commandments of God.
content_old: 19 The circumcision is nothing､ And the uncircumcision is nothing,— But keeping the commandments of God.

content: 20 Each one in the calling wherein he was called In the sam let him abide:
content_old: 20 Each one in the calling wherein he was called In the sam let him abide:

content: 21 A bond-servant wast thou called? Let it not cause thee concern; But if thou canst even become free Rather use it.
content_old: 21 A bond-servant wast thou called? Let it not cause thee concern; But if thou canst even become free Rather use it.

content: 22 For he who in the Lord was called､ being a bond-servant Is a freed-man of the Lord: In like manner he that was called being a freeman Is Christ’s bond-servant:—
content_old: 22 For he who in the Lord was called､ being a bond-servant Is a freed-man of the Lord: In like manner he that was called being a freeman Is Christ’s bond-servant:—

content: 23 With a price have ye been bought,— Do not become bond-servants of men:
content_old: 23 With a price have ye been bought,— Do not become bond-servants of men:

content: 24 Each one wherein he was called, brethren In the same let him abide with God.
content_old: 24 Each one wherein he was called, brethren In the same let him abide with God.

content: 25 But concerning them who are virgin Injunction of the Lord have I none; Yet a judgment do I give､ as one who hath obtained mercy from the Lord to be faithful:—
content_old: 25 But concerning them who are virgin Injunction of the Lord have I none; Yet a judgment do I give､ as one who hath obtained mercy from the Lord to be faithful:—

content: 26 I consider this､ then､ to be good in the circumstances, by reason of the existing distress,— That it is good for a man so to be:
content_old: 26 I consider this､ then､ to be good in the circumstances, by reason of the existing distress,— That it is good for a man so to be:

content: 27 Hast thou become bound to a wife? Do not seek to be loosed; Hast thou become loosed from a wife? Do not seek a wife.
content_old: 27 Hast thou become bound to a wife? Do not seek to be loosed; Hast thou become loosed from a wife? Do not seek a wife.

content: 28 If､ however､ thou shouldst even marry Thou hast not sinned; And if one who is virgin should marry That one hath not sinned;— But tribulation of the flesh shall such have:— Howbeit I spare you.
content_old: 28 If､ however､ thou shouldst even marry Thou hast not sinned; And if one who is virgin should marry That one hath not sinned;— But tribulation of the flesh shall such have:— Howbeit I spare you.

content: 29 But this I say—— The opportunity is contracted for what remaineth—— In order that they who have wives May be as though thay had none,
content_old: 29 But this I say—— The opportunity is contracted for what remaineth—— In order that they who have wives May be as though thay had none,

content: 30 And they who weep As though they wept not, And they who rejoice As though they rejoiced not, And they who buy As though they possessed not,
content_old: 30 And they who weep As though they wept not, And they who rejoice As though they rejoiced not, And they who buy As though they possessed not,

content: 31 And they who use the world As though they used it not to the full,— For the fashion of this world passeth away;
content_old: 31 And they who use the world As though they used it not to the full,— For the fashion of this world passeth away;

content: 32 And I desire you to be without anxiety:— The unmarried man is anxious for the things of the Lord, How he may please the Lord;
content_old: 32 And I desire you to be without anxiety:— The unmarried man is anxious for the things of the Lord, How he may please the Lord;

content: 33 But he that hath married is anxious for the things of the world, How he may please his wife——
content_old: 33 But he that hath married is anxious for the things of the world, How he may please his wife——

content: 34 and he is divided; And the unmarried woman､ or the virgin is anxious for the things of the Lord, That she may be holy both in her body and in her spirit; But she that hath married is anxious for the things of the world, How she may please her husband.
content_old: 34 and he is divided; And the unmarried woman､ or the virgin is anxious for the things of the Lord, That she may be holy both in her body and in her spirit; But she that hath married is anxious for the things of the world, How she may please her husband.

content: 35 This however､ with a view to your own profit am I saying,— Not that a snare upon you I may cast, But with a view to what is comely､ and devoted unto the Lord without distraction.
content_old: 35 This however､ with a view to your own profit am I saying,— Not that a snare upon you I may cast, But with a view to what is comely､ and devoted unto the Lord without distraction.

content: 36 If however anyone considereth it behaving unseemly towards his virginity,— If he should be beyond the bloom of life,— And thus it ought to come about What he chooseth let him do,—he sinneth not: Let them marry:
content_old: 36 If however anyone considereth it behaving unseemly towards his virginity,— If he should be beyond the bloom of life,— And thus it ought to come about What he chooseth let him do,—he sinneth not: Let them marry:

content: 37 But he that standeth in his heart steadfast, Having no necessity, But hath authority concerning his own will, And this hath determined in his own heart,— To preserve his own virginity Well shall he do.
content_old: 37 But he that standeth in his heart steadfast, Having no necessity, But hath authority concerning his own will, And this hath determined in his own heart,— To preserve his own virginity Well shall he do.

content: 38 So that he that giveth in marriage his own virginity Doeth well; And he that giveth it not Shall do better.
content_old: 38 So that he that giveth in marriage his own virginity Doeth well; And he that giveth it not Shall do better.

content: 39 A wife is bound for as long a time as her husband is living; But if the husband have fallen asleep She is free to be married unto whom she pleaseth,— Only in the Lord;
content_old: 39 A wife is bound for as long a time as her husband is living; But if the husband have fallen asleep She is free to be married unto whom she pleaseth,— Only in the Lord;

content: 1 Now concerning the idol-sacrifices we are aware—— Because we all have knowledge,— Knowledge puffeth up, But love buildeth up;
content_old: 1 Now concerning the idol-sacrifices we are aware—— Because we all have knowledge,— Knowledge puffeth up, But love buildeth up;

content: 2 If anyone thinketh that he knoweth anything not yet knoweth he､ as he must needs come to know,
content_old: 2 If anyone thinketh that he knoweth anything not yet knoweth he､ as he must needs come to know,

content: 3 But if anyone loveth God the same is known of him——
content_old: 3 But if anyone loveth God the same is known of him——

content: 4 Concerning､ then､ the eating of idol-sacrifices We are aware— That an idol is nothing in the world, And that none is God save one.
content_old: 4 Concerning､ then､ the eating of idol-sacrifices We are aware— That an idol is nothing in the world, And that none is God save one.

content: 5 For if indeed there are so-called gods､ whether in heaven or upon earth,— As indeed there are gods many and lords many
content_old: 5 For if indeed there are so-called gods､ whether in heaven or upon earth,— As indeed there are gods many and lords many

content: 6 Yet to us there is one God the Father, Of whom are all things､ and we for him; And one Lord Jesus Christ, Through whom are all things､ and we through him.
content_old: 6 Yet to us there is one God the Father, Of whom are all things､ and we for him; And one Lord Jesus Christ, Through whom are all things､ and we through him.

content: 7 Howbeit､ not in all is the knowledge; But some by their familiarity､ until even now､ with the idol as an idol-sacrifice eat it, And their conscience being weak is defiled.
content_old: 7 Howbeit､ not in all is the knowledge; But some by their familiarity､ until even now､ with the idol as an idol-sacrifice eat it, And their conscience being weak is defiled.

content: 8 Food indeed､ will not commend us unto God,— Neither if we eat not do we lack, Nor if we eat do we abound.
content_old: 8 Food indeed､ will not commend us unto God,— Neither if we eat not do we lack, Nor if we eat do we abound.

content: 9 But be taking heed､ lest by any means your right itself become an occasion of stumbling unto the weak;
content_old: 9 But be taking heed､ lest by any means your right itself become an occasion of stumbling unto the weak;

content: 10 For if anyone should see thee who hast knowledge､ in an idol-temple reclining Will not his conscience being weak､ be built up for the eating of the idol-sacrifices?
content_old: 10 For if anyone should see thee who hast knowledge､ in an idol-temple reclining Will not his conscience being weak､ be built up for the eating of the idol-sacrifices?

content: 11 In fact､ he that is weak is being destroyed by thy knowledge— The brother for whose sake Christ died.
content_old: 11 In fact､ he that is weak is being destroyed by thy knowledge— The brother for whose sake Christ died.

content: 12 But in thus sinning against the brethren and wounding their conscience､ seeing it is weak Against Christ are ye sinning.
content_old: 12 But in thus sinning against the brethren and wounding their conscience､ seeing it is weak Against Christ are ye sinning.

content: 1 Am I not free? Am I not an apostle? Jesus our Lord have I not seen? Are not ye my work in the Lord?
content_old: 1 Am I not free? Am I not an apostle? Jesus our Lord have I not seen? Are not ye my work in the Lord?

content: 2 If unto others I am not an apostle Certainly at least unto you I am; For the seal of my apostleship ye are in the Lord.
content_old: 2 If unto others I am not an apostle Certainly at least unto you I am; For the seal of my apostleship ye are in the Lord.

content: 3 My defence､ unto them who are examining me is this:—
content_old: 3 My defence､ unto them who are examining me is this:—

content: 4 Have we not a right to eat and drink?
content_old: 4 Have we not a right to eat and drink?

content: 5 Have we not a right to take round a sister wife,— As even the rest of the apostles､ and the brethren of the Lord､ and Cephas?
content_old: 5 Have we not a right to take round a sister wife,— As even the rest of the apostles､ and the brethren of the Lord､ and Cephas?

content: 6 Or have only I and Barnabas not a right to forbear working?
content_old: 6 Or have only I and Barnabas not a right to forbear working?

content: 7 Who serveth as a soldier､ at his own charges､ at any time? Who planteth a vineyard,—and the fruit thereof doth not eat? Or who shepherdeth a flock,—and of the milk of the flock doth not eat?
content_old: 7 Who serveth as a soldier､ at his own charges､ at any time? Who planteth a vineyard,—and the fruit thereof doth not eat? Or who shepherdeth a flock,—and of the milk of the flock doth not eat?

content: 8 Is it after the manner of men that these things I am saying? Or doth not even the law the same things say?
content_old: 8 Is it after the manner of men that these things I am saying? Or doth not even the law the same things say?

content: 9 For in the law of Moses it is written— Thou shalt not muzzle an ox when it is treading out the corn:— Is it for the oxen God is caring?
content_old: 9 For in the law of Moses it is written— Thou shalt not muzzle an ox when it is treading out the corn:— Is it for the oxen God is caring?

content: 10 Or for our sakes altogether is he saying it? For our sakes it was written; Because he that ploweth ought to plow in hope,— And he that thresheth to thresh in hope of partaking.
content_old: 10 Or for our sakes altogether is he saying it? For our sakes it was written; Because he that ploweth ought to plow in hope,— And he that thresheth to thresh in hope of partaking.

content: 11 If we unto you the things of the Spirit have sown Is it a great matter､ if we of you the things of the flesh shall reap?
content_old: 11 If we unto you the things of the Spirit have sown Is it a great matter､ if we of you the things of the flesh shall reap?

content: 12 If others of this right､ over you､ are partaking Should not rather we? Nevertheless､ we used not this right; but all such things do we conceal,—lest we should cause any hindrance unto the glad message of the Christ.
content_old: 12 If others of this right､ over you､ are partaking Should not rather we? Nevertheless､ we used not this right; but all such things do we conceal,—lest we should cause any hindrance unto the glad message of the Christ.

content: 13 Know ye not That they who labour in the holy rites Do eat the provisions out of the holy place?— They who at the altar wait Do with the altar share?
content_old: 13 Know ye not That they who labour in the holy rites Do eat the provisions out of the holy place?— They who at the altar wait Do with the altar share?

content: 14 Thus also､ hath the Lord appointed— That they who the glad message tell Should of the glad-message live.
content_old: 14 Thus also､ hath the Lord appointed— That they who the glad message tell Should of the glad-message live.

content: 15 I however､ have not used any of these things; and have not written these things､ in order that so it should be done in my case; For it were good for me rather to die than— My boast shall no man make void!
content_old: 15 I however､ have not used any of these things; and have not written these things､ in order that so it should be done in my case; For it were good for me rather to die than— My boast shall no man make void!

content: 16 For if I be telling the glad-message it is with me no matter of boasting; for necessity upon me lieth,—for it is Woe to me if I should not be telling the glad-message;
content_old: 16 For if I be telling the glad-message it is with me no matter of boasting; for necessity upon me lieth,—for it is Woe to me if I should not be telling the glad-message;

content: 17 For if by choice this thing I am doing I have a reward; But if not by choice with a stewardship have I been entrusted!
content_old: 17 For if by choice this thing I am doing I have a reward; But if not by choice with a stewardship have I been entrusted!

content: 18 What､ then､ is my reward? That in telling the glad-message free of cost I should put the glad-message,—to the end I should not use to the full my right in the glad-message.
content_old: 18 What､ then､ is my reward? That in telling the glad-message free of cost I should put the glad-message,—to the end I should not use to the full my right in the glad-message.

content: 19 For though free from all Unto all my self I enslaved,— That the larger number I might win:
content_old: 19 For though free from all Unto all my self I enslaved,— That the larger number I might win:

content: 20 Therefore became I to the Jews as a Jew,— That Jews I might win; To them who were under law as under law,— Not being myself under law,— That them who were under law I might win;
content_old: 20 Therefore became I to the Jews as a Jew,— That Jews I might win; To them who were under law as under law,— Not being myself under law,— That them who were under law I might win;

content: 21 To them who were without law as without law,— Not being without law to God, But lawfully subject to Christ,— That I might win them who were without law.
content_old: 21 To them who were without law as without law,— Not being without law to God, But lawfully subject to Christ,— That I might win them who were without law.

content: 22 I became unto the weak weak,— That the weak I might win;— To all men have I become all things, That by all means some I might save.
content_old: 22 I became unto the weak weak,— That the weak I might win;— To all men have I become all things, That by all means some I might save.

content: 23 But all things am I doing for the sake of the glad-message, That a joint-partaker thereof I may become.
content_old: 23 But all things am I doing for the sake of the glad-message, That a joint-partaker thereof I may become.

content: 24 Know ye not That they who in a racecourse run All indeed､ run,— But one receiveth the prize? So be running､ that ye may lay hold.
content_old: 24 Know ye not That they who in a racecourse run All indeed､ run,— But one receiveth the prize? So be running､ that ye may lay hold.

content: 25 But every man who striveth in the games In all things useth self-control;— They indeed､ then､ that a corruptible crown they may receive; But we an incorruptible!
content_old: 25 But every man who striveth in the games In all things useth self-control;— They indeed､ then､ that a corruptible crown they may receive; But we an incorruptible!

content: 26 I therefore､ So am running､ as not uncertainly, So am boxing､ as not thrashing air;
content_old: 26 I therefore､ So am running､ as not uncertainly, So am boxing､ as not thrashing air;

content: 1 For I wish not ye should be ignorant､ brethren, That all our fathers were under the cloud, And all passed through the sea,—
content_old: 1 For I wish not ye should be ignorant､ brethren, That all our fathers were under the cloud, And all passed through the sea,—

content: 2 And all immersed themselves into Moses､ In the cloud､ and in the sea;
content_old: 2 And all immersed themselves into Moses､ In the cloud､ and in the sea;

content: 3 And all did eat the same spiritual food,
content_old: 3 And all did eat the same spiritual food,

content: 4 And all drank the same spiritual drink,— For they continued to drink of the spiritual rock that followed them, And the rock was the Christ:—
content_old: 4 And all drank the same spiritual drink,— For they continued to drink of the spiritual rock that followed them, And the rock was the Christ:—

content: 5 Nevertheless with the most of them God was not well-pleased, For they were strewed along in the desert.
content_old: 5 Nevertheless with the most of them God was not well-pleased, For they were strewed along in the desert.

content: 6 But in these things they became ensamples for us, To the end we should not be covetous of evil things､ Even as they also coveted;
content_old: 6 But in these things they became ensamples for us, To the end we should not be covetous of evil things､ Even as they also coveted;

content: 7 Neither become ye idolaters､ As some of them,—As it is written— The people sat down to eat and drink, And rose up to be making sport;
content_old: 7 Neither become ye idolaters､ As some of them,—As it is written— The people sat down to eat and drink, And rose up to be making sport;

content: 8 Neither let us commit fornication､ As some of them committed fornication､ And there fell､ in one day､ three and twenty thousand;
content_old: 8 Neither let us commit fornication､ As some of them committed fornication､ And there fell､ in one day､ three and twenty thousand;

content: 9 Neither let us be putting the Lord to the test､ As some of them put him to the test, And by the serpents were perishing;
content_old: 9 Neither let us be putting the Lord to the test､ As some of them put him to the test, And by the serpents were perishing;

content: 10 Neither be ye murmuring､ Even as some of them murmured, And perished by the destroyer.
content_old: 10 Neither be ye murmuring､ Even as some of them murmured, And perished by the destroyer.

content: 11 But these things by way of type were happening unto them, And were written with a view to our admonition､ Unto whom the ends of the ages have reached along.
content_old: 11 But these things by way of type were happening unto them, And were written with a view to our admonition､ Unto whom the ends of the ages have reached along.

content: 12 So that he that thinketh he is standing let him take heed lest he fall.
content_old: 12 So that he that thinketh he is standing let him take heed lest he fall.

content: 13 Trial hath not taken you､ save such as man can bear; Faithful moreover is God､ who will not suffer you to be tried above what ye are able, But will make with the trial also the way of escape that ye may be able to hold out.
content_old: 13 Trial hath not taken you､ save such as man can bear; Faithful moreover is God､ who will not suffer you to be tried above what ye are able, But will make with the trial also the way of escape that ye may be able to hold out.

content: 14 Wherefore､ my beloved, flee from idolatry,—
content_old: 14 Wherefore､ my beloved, flee from idolatry,—

content: 15 As to prudent men I speak,— Judge ye what I say:—
content_old: 15 As to prudent men I speak,— Judge ye what I say:—

content: 16 The cup of blessing which we bless Is it not a sharing together of the blood of the Christ? The loaf which we break Is it not a sharing together of the body of the Christ?
content_old: 16 The cup of blessing which we bless Is it not a sharing together of the blood of the Christ? The loaf which we break Is it not a sharing together of the body of the Christ?

content: 17 Because one loaf､ one body we the many are, For we all of the one loaf partake.
content_old: 17 Because one loaf､ one body we the many are, For we all of the one loaf partake.

content: 18 Be looking at Israel after the flesh:— Are not they who eat the sacrifices joint partakers with the altar?
content_old: 18 Be looking at Israel after the flesh:— Are not they who eat the sacrifices joint partakers with the altar?

content: 19 What､ then､ am I saying?— That an idol-sacrifice is anything? Or that an idol is anything?
content_old: 19 What､ then､ am I saying?— That an idol-sacrifice is anything? Or that an idol is anything?

content: 20 On the contrary— That the things which the nations sacrifice Unto demons､ and not unto God they sacrifice; And I wish not that ye should become sharers together with the demons!
content_old: 20 On the contrary— That the things which the nations sacrifice Unto demons､ and not unto God they sacrifice; And I wish not that ye should become sharers together with the demons!

content: 21 Ye cannot be drinking—a cup of the Lord､ and a cup of demons; Ye cannot be partaking of a table of the Lord and a table of demons.
content_old: 21 Ye cannot be drinking—a cup of the Lord､ and a cup of demons; Ye cannot be partaking of a table of the Lord and a table of demons.

content: 22 Or are we to provoke the Lord to jealousy? Are we mightier than he?
content_old: 22 Or are we to provoke the Lord to jealousy? Are we mightier than he?

content: 23 All things are allowable—but not all things are profitable,— All things are allowable—but not all things upbuild.
content_old: 23 All things are allowable—but not all things are profitable,— All things are allowable—but not all things upbuild.

content: 24 Let no one be seeking what concerneth himself, But that which concerneth some one else.
content_old: 24 Let no one be seeking what concerneth himself, But that which concerneth some one else.

content: 25 Whatsoever in the market is sold eat,— Asking no question､ for conscience sake;
content_old: 25 Whatsoever in the market is sold eat,— Asking no question､ for conscience sake;

content: 26 For unto the Lord belongeth the earth､ and the fulness thereof.
content_old: 26 For unto the Lord belongeth the earth､ and the fulness thereof.

content: 27 If one of them who believe not invite you and ye are disposed to go Whatsoever is set before you eat,— Asking no question､ for conscience sake.
content_old: 27 If one of them who believe not invite you and ye are disposed to go Whatsoever is set before you eat,— Asking no question､ for conscience sake.

content: 28 But if anyone should say unto you— This is a holy sacrifice Do not eat, for that man’s sake who disclosed it, and for conscience sake:—
content_old: 28 But if anyone should say unto you— This is a holy sacrifice Do not eat, for that man’s sake who disclosed it, and for conscience sake:—

content: 29 But conscience I mean､ not thine own, but the other’s,— For why is my freedom to be judged by another’s conscience?
content_old: 29 But conscience I mean､ not thine own, but the other’s,— For why is my freedom to be judged by another’s conscience?

content: 30 If I with gratitude partake Why am I to be defamed as to that for which I give thanks?
content_old: 30 If I with gratitude partake Why am I to be defamed as to that for which I give thanks?

content: 31 Whether､ therefore､ ye eat or drink, or whatsoever ye do do all things to the glory of God.
content_old: 31 Whether､ therefore､ ye eat or drink, or whatsoever ye do do all things to the glory of God.

content: 32 Give no occasion of stumbling— Whether to Jews､ or to Greeks､ or to the assembly of God:
content_old: 32 Give no occasion of stumbling— Whether to Jews､ or to Greeks､ or to the assembly of God:

content: 1 Become imitators of me,—even as I also am of Christ.
content_old: 1 Become imitators of me,—even as I also am of Christ.

content: 2 Now I praise you､ that in all things ye have me in remembrance, And even as I delivered unto you the instructions ye hold them fast.
content_old: 2 Now I praise you､ that in all things ye have me in remembrance, And even as I delivered unto you the instructions ye hold them fast.

content: 3 But I wish you to know— That the head of every man is the Christ, And the head of a woman is the man; And the head of the Christ is God.
content_old: 3 But I wish you to know— That the head of every man is the Christ, And the head of a woman is the man; And the head of the Christ is God.

content: 4 Every man praying､ or prophesying, having anything upon his head putteth to shame his head;
content_old: 4 Every man praying､ or prophesying, having anything upon his head putteth to shame his head;

content: 5 But every woman praying､ or prophesying, with her head unveiled putteth to shame her head,—for it is one and the same with her having been shaven.
content_old: 5 But every woman praying､ or prophesying, with her head unveiled putteth to shame her head,—for it is one and the same with her having been shaven.

content: 6 For if a woman doth not veil herself let her also be shorn; But if it were a shame in a woman to be shorn or shaven let her be veiled.
content_old: 6 For if a woman doth not veil herself let her also be shorn; But if it were a shame in a woman to be shorn or shaven let her be veiled.

content: 7 For a man indeed､ ought not to be veiling his head, Being the image and glory of God,— But the woman is the glory of man;
content_old: 7 For a man indeed､ ought not to be veiling his head, Being the image and glory of God,— But the woman is the glory of man;

content: 8 For man is not of woman, But woman of man;
content_old: 8 For man is not of woman, But woman of man;

content: 9 For also man was not created for the sake of the woman, But woman for the sake of the man.
content_old: 9 For also man was not created for the sake of the woman, But woman for the sake of the man.

content: 10 For this cause ought the woman to have permission upon her head, because of the messengers.
content_old: 10 For this cause ought the woman to have permission upon her head, because of the messengers.

content: 11 Howbeit､ neither is woman apart from man, Nor man apart from woman—in the Lord;
content_old: 11 Howbeit､ neither is woman apart from man, Nor man apart from woman—in the Lord;

content: 12 For just as the woman is of the man So also the man is through means of the woman;— But all things are of God.
content_old: 12 For just as the woman is of the man So also the man is through means of the woman;— But all things are of God.

content: 13 Among your own selves judge ye,— Is it becoming for a woman—unveiled to be praying unto God?
content_old: 13 Among your own selves judge ye,— Is it becoming for a woman—unveiled to be praying unto God?

content: 14 Doth not even nature herself teach you— That if a man have long hair it is a dishonour to him;
content_old: 14 Doth not even nature herself teach you— That if a man have long hair it is a dishonour to him;

content: 15 But if a woman have long hair it is a glory to her,— For her long hair instead of a veil hath been given to her.
content_old: 15 But if a woman have long hair it is a glory to her,— For her long hair instead of a veil hath been given to her.

content: 16 But if anyone thinketh to be contentious We have no such custom,— Nor yet the assemblies of God.
content_old: 16 But if anyone thinketh to be contentious We have no such custom,— Nor yet the assemblies of God.

content: 17 But in giving you the following charge I praise you not,— In that not for the better､ but for the worse ye come together.
content_old: 17 But in giving you the following charge I praise you not,— In that not for the better､ but for the worse ye come together.

content: 18 For first of all— When ye come together in assembly I hear that divisions among you exist,— And in part I believe it;
content_old: 18 For first of all— When ye come together in assembly I hear that divisions among you exist,— And in part I believe it;

content: 19 For there must needs be even parties among you, That the approved themselves may become manifest among you.
content_old: 19 For there must needs be even parties among you, That the approved themselves may become manifest among you.

content: 20 When､ therefore､ ye come together into one place It is not to eat a supper unto the Lord;
content_old: 20 When､ therefore､ ye come together into one place It is not to eat a supper unto the Lord;

content: 21 For each one taketh beforehand his own supper in your eating, And one indeed､ is hungry､ Whereas another is drinking to excess.
content_old: 21 For each one taketh beforehand his own supper in your eating, And one indeed､ is hungry､ Whereas another is drinking to excess.

content: 22 What! have ye not houses for your eating and drinking? Or the assembly of God do ye despise､ and put to shame them who have nothing? What am I to say to you? Shall I praise you? In this I praise you not.
content_old: 22 What! have ye not houses for your eating and drinking? Or the assembly of God do ye despise､ and put to shame them who have nothing? What am I to say to you? Shall I praise you? In this I praise you not.

content: 23 For I myself received from the Lord— That which I also delivered unto you,— How that the Lord Jesus､ In the night in which he was being delivered up Took a loaf,
content_old: 23 For I myself received from the Lord— That which I also delivered unto you,— How that the Lord Jesus､ In the night in which he was being delivered up Took a loaf,

content: 24 And､ giving thanks､ brake it, and said— This is my body､ which is for you,— This do ye､ in remembrance of me;
content_old: 24 And､ giving thanks､ brake it, and said— This is my body､ which is for you,— This do ye､ in remembrance of me;

content: 25 In the same manner the cup also､ After they had taken supper saying— This cup is the new covenant in my blood,— This do ye as often soever as ye may be drinking it in remembrance of me.
content_old: 25 In the same manner the cup also､ After they had taken supper saying— This cup is the new covenant in my blood,— This do ye as often soever as ye may be drinking it in remembrance of me.

content: 26 For as often as ye may be eating this loaf､ And the cup may be drinking The death of the Lord do ye announce until he come.
content_old: 26 For as often as ye may be eating this loaf､ And the cup may be drinking The death of the Lord do ye announce until he come.

content: 27 So that whosoever may be eating the loaf､ or drinking the cup of the Lord in an unworthy manner Shall be responsible for the body and blood of the Lord.
content_old: 27 So that whosoever may be eating the loaf､ or drinking the cup of the Lord in an unworthy manner Shall be responsible for the body and blood of the Lord.

content: 28 But let a man be proving himself,— And so of the loaf let him eat､ and of the cup let him drink;
content_old: 28 But let a man be proving himself,— And so of the loaf let him eat､ and of the cup let him drink;

content: 29 For he that is eating and drinking— Judgment unto himself doth eat and drink,— If he be not setting apart the body.
content_old: 29 For he that is eating and drinking— Judgment unto himself doth eat and drink,— If he be not setting apart the body.

content: 30 For this cause many among you are weak and sickly; And not a few are falling asleep.
content_old: 30 For this cause many among you are weak and sickly; And not a few are falling asleep.

content: 31 If､ however､ we had been setting ourselves apart We had not､ in that case､ been coming under judgment;
content_old: 31 If､ however､ we had been setting ourselves apart We had not､ in that case､ been coming under judgment;

content: 32 But being brought under judgment By the Lord are we being disciplined, Lest with the world we should be condemned.
content_old: 32 But being brought under judgment By the Lord are we being disciplined, Lest with the world we should be condemned.

content: 33 So then､ my brethren,— When ye come together for the eating Unto one another be giving welcome:—
content_old: 33 So then､ my brethren,— When ye come together for the eating Unto one another be giving welcome:—

content: 1 But concerning the spiritually gifted brethren, I am not wishing you to be ignorant.
content_old: 1 But concerning the spiritually gifted brethren, I am not wishing you to be ignorant.

content: 2 Ye know that when ye were of the nations Unto the dumb idols､ howsoever ye were being led Ye were seduced.
content_old: 2 Ye know that when ye were of the nations Unto the dumb idols､ howsoever ye were being led Ye were seduced.

content: 3 Wherefore､ I give you to know— That no one in God’s Spirit speaking saith— Accursed Jesus! And no one can say— Lord Jesus! Save in the Holy Spirit.
content_old: 3 Wherefore､ I give you to know— That no one in God’s Spirit speaking saith— Accursed Jesus! And no one can say— Lord Jesus! Save in the Holy Spirit.

content: 4 But distributions of gifts there are､ Yet the same Spirit,
content_old: 4 But distributions of gifts there are､ Yet the same Spirit,

content: 5 And distributions of ministries there are､ And the same Lord,
content_old: 5 And distributions of ministries there are､ And the same Lord,

content: 6 And distributions of energies there are､ And the same God— Who energiseth all things in all.
content_old: 6 And distributions of energies there are､ And the same God— Who energiseth all things in all.

content: 7 But unto each one is given the manifesting of the Spirit､ With a view to that which is profitable;
content_old: 7 But unto each one is given the manifesting of the Spirit､ With a view to that which is profitable;

content: 8 For unto one indeed､ through the Spirit is given a word of wisdom, But unto another a word of knowledge according to the same Spirit;—
content_old: 8 For unto one indeed､ through the Spirit is given a word of wisdom, But unto another a word of knowledge according to the same Spirit;—

content: 9 Unto a different one faith in the same Spirit, And unto another gifts of healings in the one Spirit,
content_old: 9 Unto a different one faith in the same Spirit, And unto another gifts of healings in the one Spirit,

content: 10 And unto another energies of mighty works, And unto another prophesying, And unto another discriminations of spirits,— Unto a different one kinds of tongues, And unto another translation of tongues;—
content_old: 10 And unto another energies of mighty works, And unto another prophesying, And unto another discriminations of spirits,— Unto a different one kinds of tongues, And unto another translation of tongues;—

content: 11 But all these energiseth the one and the same Spirit, Distributing unto each one peculiarly､ Even as it is disposed.
content_old: 11 But all these energiseth the one and the same Spirit, Distributing unto each one peculiarly､ Even as it is disposed.

content: 12 For just as the body is one､ and yet hath many members, But all the members of the body though many are one body So also the Christ;—
content_old: 12 For just as the body is one､ and yet hath many members, But all the members of the body though many are one body So also the Christ;—

content: 13 For even in one Spirit we all into one body have been immersed,— Whether Jews or Greeks､ Whether bond or free,— And all of one Spirit have been caused to drink.
content_old: 13 For even in one Spirit we all into one body have been immersed,— Whether Jews or Greeks､ Whether bond or free,— And all of one Spirit have been caused to drink.

content: 14 For the body also is not one member､ but many:
content_old: 14 For the body also is not one member､ but many:

content: 15 Though the foot should say— Because I am not a hand I am not of the body Is it therefore not of the body?
content_old: 15 Though the foot should say— Because I am not a hand I am not of the body Is it therefore not of the body?

content: 16 And though the ear should say— Because I am not an eye I am not of the body Is it therefore not of the body?
content_old: 16 And though the ear should say— Because I am not an eye I am not of the body Is it therefore not of the body?

content: 17 Ifthe whole body were an eye Where were the hearing? If the whole were hearing Where were the smelling?
content_old: 17 Ifthe whole body were an eye Where were the hearing? If the whole were hearing Where were the smelling?

content: 18 But now hath God set the members､ each one of them in the body even as he pleased.
content_old: 18 But now hath God set the members､ each one of them in the body even as he pleased.

content: 19 But if they all had been one member Where had been the body?
content_old: 19 But if they all had been one member Where had been the body?

content: 20 Now however there are many members､ yet one body;
content_old: 20 Now however there are many members､ yet one body;

content: 21 And the eye cannot say unto the hand— I have no need of thee,— Nor again the head､ unto the feet— I have no need of you:—
content_old: 21 And the eye cannot say unto the hand— I have no need of thee,— Nor again the head､ unto the feet— I have no need of you:—

content: 22 Nay! much more the members which seem to be weaker are necessary,
content_old: 22 Nay! much more the members which seem to be weaker are necessary,

content: 23 And the parts of the body which we deem to be less honourable On these more abundant honour do we bestow､ And our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness,
content_old: 23 And the parts of the body which we deem to be less honourable On these more abundant honour do we bestow､ And our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness,

content: 24 Whereas our comely parts have no need. But God hath tempered the body together,— Unto that which was lacking giving more abundant honour;—
content_old: 24 Whereas our comely parts have no need. But God hath tempered the body together,— Unto that which was lacking giving more abundant honour;—

content: 25 That there might be no division in the body, But that the members might have the same care one for another;
content_old: 25 That there might be no division in the body, But that the members might have the same care one for another;

content: 26 And whether one member suffereth All the members suffer with it, Or a member is glorified All the members rejoice together.
content_old: 26 And whether one member suffereth All the members suffer with it, Or a member is glorified All the members rejoice together.

content: 27 Now ye are the body of Christ､ and members severally;—
content_old: 27 Now ye are the body of Christ､ and members severally;—

content: 28 And God hath､ indeed､ set certain in the assembly,— First apostles､ second prophets､ third teachers, After that mighty works､ then gifts of healings､ helps､ guidings､ kinds of tongues.
content_old: 28 And God hath､ indeed､ set certain in the assembly,— First apostles､ second prophets､ third teachers, After that mighty works､ then gifts of healings､ helps､ guidings､ kinds of tongues.

content: 29 Are all apostles? Are all prophets? Are all teachers? Are all mighty works?
content_old: 29 Are all apostles? Are all prophets? Are all teachers? Are all mighty works?

content: 30 Have all gifts of healings? Do all with tongues speak? Do all translate?
content_old: 30 Have all gifts of healings? Do all with tongues speak? Do all translate?

content: 1 Although with the tongues of men I be speaking and of messengers､ And have not love I have become resounding brass､ or a clanging cymbal;
content_old: 1 Although with the tongues of men I be speaking and of messengers､ And have not love I have become resounding brass､ or a clanging cymbal;

content: 2 And though I have the gift of prophesying､ and know all sacred secrets､ and all knowledge,— And though I have all faith､ so as to be removing mountains, And have not love I am nothing;
content_old: 2 And though I have the gift of prophesying､ and know all sacred secrets､ and all knowledge,— And though I have all faith､ so as to be removing mountains, And have not love I am nothing;

content: 3 And though I morsel out all my goods,— And though I deliver up my body､ that I may boast, And have not love I am profited nothing.
content_old: 3 And though I morsel out all my goods,— And though I deliver up my body､ that I may boast, And have not love I am profited nothing.

content: 4 Love is patient､ Is gracious. Love is not envious､ Vaunteth not itself､ Is not puffed up,
content_old: 4 Love is patient､ Is gracious. Love is not envious､ Vaunteth not itself､ Is not puffed up,
